mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_school_info(shcool_info_id, education_type, school_name, entrance_date, graduation_date, major, attending_check, transfer_check, gpa, highest_check, double_major, seeker_id) VALUES(USER_SCHOOL_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{educationType}, #{schoolName}, #{entranceDate}, #{graduationDate}, #{major}, #{attendingCheck}, #{transferCheck}, #{gpa}, #{highestCheck}, #{doubleMajor}, #{seekerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_school_info SET education_type = #{educationType}, school_name = #{schoolName}, entrance_date = #{entranceDate}, graduation_date = #{graduationDate}, major = #{major}, attending_check = #{attendingCheck}, transfer_check = #{transferCheck}, gpa = #{gpa}, highest_check = #{highestCheck}, double_major = #{doubleMajor} WHERE shcool_info_id = #{schoolId}
mapper.select: SELECT education_type, school_name, entrance_date, graduation_date, major, attending_check, transfer_check, gpa, highest_check, double_major FROM user_school_info WHERE shcool_info_id=#{VALUE}
SELECT education_type, school_name, entrance_date, graduation_date, major, attending_check, transfer_check, gpa, highest_check, double_major FROM user_school_info WHERE seeker_id = #{seekerId}
